trans-unit.source: Provides user interface (UI) elements that enable a user to recover or reset a lost password and receive it in email.
trans-unit.target: 提供使用户在忘记密码时恢复或重置并在电子邮件中接收它的用户界面 (UI) 元素。

trans-unit.source: In this topic:
trans-unit.target: 本主题内容：

trans-unit.source: [Introduction](#introduction)
trans-unit.target: [介绍](#introduction)

trans-unit.source: [Views](#views)
trans-unit.target: [视图](#views)

trans-unit.source: [Styles and Templates](#styles_and_templates)
trans-unit.target: [样式和模板](#styles_and_templates)

trans-unit.source: [Validation Groupings](#validation_groupings)
trans-unit.target: [验证分组](#validation_groupings)

trans-unit.source: [Applying CSS Styles](#applying_styles)
trans-unit.target: [应用 CSS 样式](#applying_styles)

trans-unit.source: [Accessibility](#accessibility)
trans-unit.target: [辅助功能](#accessibility)

trans-unit.source: [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax)
trans-unit.target: [声明性语法](#declarative_syntax)

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 介绍

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control assists users who have forgotten their passwords.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件可帮助用户忘记其密码。

trans-unit.source: It enables a user to request an email message containing either a new password or the password already associated with his or her user name.
trans-unit.target: 它使用户请求包含一个新密码或已与他或她的用户名相关联的密码的电子邮件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> Web control uses Internet email services to send recovered or new passwords to users.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> Web 控件使用 Internet 电子邮件服务向用户发送已恢复的或新的密码。

trans-unit.source: There are inherent security risks with sending passwords in email.
trans-unit.target: 有电子邮件中发送密码的固有安全风险。

trans-unit.source: You should determine whether these security risks are acceptable to your site.
trans-unit.target: 你应该确定是否可以接受你的站点的这些安全风险。

trans-unit.source: If you are not familiar with the set of login controls available in ASP.NET, see [ASP.NET Login Controls Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d) before continuing.
trans-unit.target: 如果你不熟悉的 ASP.NET 提供的登录控件集，请参阅[ASP.NET 登录控件概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d)才能继续。

trans-unit.source: For a list of other topics related to login controls and membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd).
trans-unit.target: 有关与登录控件和成员资格相关的其他主题的列表，请参阅[使用成员资格管理用户](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。

trans-unit.source: Users can recover passwords only when the membership provider defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A> property supports clear text or encrypted passwords.
trans-unit.target: 仅当成员资格提供程序定义中时，用户可以恢复密码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A>属性支持明文密码或加密的密码。

trans-unit.source: Because hashed passwords cannot be recovered, users at sites that use hashed passwords can only reset their passwords.
trans-unit.target: 因为无法恢复经过哈希处理的密码，使用经过哈希处理的密码的站点的用户只能重置其密码。

trans-unit.source: Accepting user input is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 接受用户输入是一个潜在的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: Malicious users can send data that is intended to expose vulnerabilities or run programs that try generated passwords.
trans-unit.target: 恶意用户可以发送数据，用于公开的漏洞或运行程序会尝试生成的密码。

trans-unit.source: To improve security when working with user input, you should use the validation features of your control and secure any data providers that are configured for your control.
trans-unit.target: 为了提高安全性，处理用户输入时，应使用的控件的验证功能和安全配置的任何数据提供程序为您的控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c), [Basic Security Practices for Web Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3eeeee9e-b09f-4c7f-8ce5-d9ca1f9322ad), and [Securing Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2dab2012-c278-426a-bb0d-93b260c428a7).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护登录控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)， [Web 应用程序的基本安全实践](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3eeeee9e-b09f-4c7f-8ce5-d9ca1f9322ad)，和[保护成员资格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2dab2012-c278-426a-bb0d-93b260c428a7)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control can be used when a membership user has not been approved (<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsApproved%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is set to `false`), but it cannot be used when a membership user has been locked out (<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is set to `true`).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>成员资格用户未获批准时，可以使用控件 (<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsApproved%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>设置为`false`)，但它不能用于成员资格用户锁定时 (<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>设置为`true`)。

trans-unit.source: The email message is sent using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用发送电子邮件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>类。

trans-unit.source: To be able to send email to users, you must configure a mail server in your application's Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 若要能够向用户发送电子邮件，则必须在应用程序的 Web.config 文件中配置邮件服务器。

trans-unit.source: You can change the content of the email sent to users by setting a custom message in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MailDefinition%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以更改通过设置自定义消息发送到用户的电子邮件的内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MailDefinition%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: It is not possible to guarantee that a user will receive or view an email message.
trans-unit.target: 不能保证用户将接收或查看电子邮件。

trans-unit.source: To verify that a user has received a notification by email, consider providing a confirmation link in the message, allowing the user to confirm that the notification was received.
trans-unit.target: 若要验证用户通过电子邮件中收到通知，请考虑提供消息中的确认链接，它使用户能确认已收到通知。

trans-unit.source: Views
trans-unit.target: 视图

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control has three states, or views:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件具有三个状态或视图：

trans-unit.source: UserName view -- Asks the user for his or her registered user name.
trans-unit.target: 用户名视图-要求用户输入他或她注册的用户名。

trans-unit.source: Question view -- Requires the user to provide the answer to a stored question to reset the password.
trans-unit.target: 问题视图--要求用户提供重置的密码存储问题的答案。

trans-unit.source: Success view -- Tells the user whether the password recovery or reset was successful.
trans-unit.target: 成功视图--告知用户的密码恢复或重置是否成功。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control displays the Question view only when the membership provider defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A> property supports password question and answer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>仅当成员资格提供程序定义中时，控件将显示问题视图<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A>属性支持密码提示问题和答案。

trans-unit.source: Styles and Templates
trans-unit.target: 样式和模板

trans-unit.source: You can use an extensive set of style properties to customize the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用一套丰富的样式属性的外观进行自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can apply custom templates to the three views if you need complete control over the appearance of the control.
trans-unit.target: 或者，可以将自定义模板应用到三个视图中，如果需要完全控制控件的外观。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTemplate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A> properties to create templates for these views.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A>，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTemplate%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A>属性创建这些视图的模板。

trans-unit.source: If you define a template for a view, the style properties of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果你定义的视图的样式属性的模板<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>不起作用。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control style properties and explains which UI element each style property affects.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件的样式属性并说明每个样式属性会影响哪些用户界面元素。

trans-unit.source: For a list of which properties each style applies to, see the documentation for the individual style properties.
trans-unit.target: 有关哪些属性的每个样式应用到的列表，请参阅的单个样式属性的文档。

trans-unit.target: 样式属性

trans-unit.target: 受影响的 UI 元素

trans-unit.target: 提交所有视图上的按钮。

trans-unit.source: Error text displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 向用户显示的错误文本。

trans-unit.source: Links to other pages.
trans-unit.target: 链接到其他页。

trans-unit.source: Instructional text on the page that tells users how to use the control.
trans-unit.target: 告知用户如何使用控件的页面上的说明文本。

trans-unit.source: Labels for all input fields, such as text boxes.
trans-unit.target: 所有输入字段，例如文本框的标签。

trans-unit.source: Text entry input fields.
trans-unit.target: 文本输入的输入的字段。

trans-unit.target: 每个视图的标题文本。

trans-unit.source: Text displayed to the user when the password recovery or reset attempt is successful.
trans-unit.target: 当密码恢复或重置尝试不成功时，向用户显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control is not customized with templates, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control applies to the first text box in the control and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A> property, which is applied to all text boxes of the control.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件不使用模板，自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件适用于控件中的第一个文本框和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A>属性，应用于控件的所有文本框。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control is customized with templates, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A> property are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件自定义模板，则<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>属性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A>属性将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: In this case, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A> property of each template child control directly.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>属性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A>直接每个模板子控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control properties represented by text boxes, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.Answer%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.Question%2A>, are accessible during all phases of the page life cycle.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> 控件属性的文本框，如表示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.Answer%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.Question%2A>，页生命周期的所有阶段都可访问。

trans-unit.source: The control will pick up any changes made by the end user by means of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged> event triggered by the textboxes.
trans-unit.target: 控件将选取由最终用户的方式进行任何更改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged>由文本框触发的事件。

trans-unit.source: Validation Groupings
trans-unit.target: 验证分组

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control creates a validation group for all required field validators in the control so that other input controls on the page are not affected by validating the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件创建的验证组的验证的控件，因此该其他输入页上的控件中的所有必填的字段验证程序不会影响<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control is used as the name of the validation group.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件用作验证组的名称。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control with the ID "PasswordRecovery1" will use a validation group name of "PasswordRecovery1".
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>具有 ID"PasswordRecovery1"控件将使用"PasswordRecovery1"的验证组名称。

trans-unit.source: If you want the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control to participate in another validation group, you must template the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>参与另一个验证组控件，必须将控件模板。

trans-unit.source: Applying CSS Styles
trans-unit.target: 应用 CSS 样式

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control lets you specify CSS style rules in markup.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制可用于在标记中指定 CSS 样式规则。

trans-unit.source: If you use templates to customize the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control, you can specify CSS styles in the markup in the templates.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用模板的外观进行自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件，你可以在模板中标记中指定 CSS 样式。

trans-unit.source: In that case, no extra outer table is required.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，没有额外的外部表是必需的。

trans-unit.source: You can prevent the table from being rendered by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.RenderOuterTable%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以防止通过设置呈现表<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.RenderOuterTable%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Accessibility
trans-unit.target: 可访问性

trans-unit.source: For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何配置此控件，以使其生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).

trans-unit.source: Declarative Syntax
trans-unit.target: 声明性语法

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets the answer to the password recovery confirmation question entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取由用户输入的密码恢复确认提示问题的答案。

trans-unit.source: The answer to the password recovery confirmation question entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 由用户输入的密码恢复确认提示问题的答案。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.Answer%2A> property contains the answer to the confirmation question entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.Answer%2A>属性包含用户输入的确认问题的答案。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.Answer%2A> property is valid only after the page has been posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.Answer%2A>只有在页发送回发到服务器后，属性才有效。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the label text for the password confirmation answer text box.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置密码确认答案文本框的标签文本。

trans-unit.source: The label for the password confirmation answer text box.
trans-unit.target: 密码确认答案文本框的标签。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Answer:"
trans-unit.target: 默认值为“答案:”

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.AnswerLabelText%2A> property contains the label text for the password recovery confirmation answer text box.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.AnswerLookupError> event is raised when the answer to the password recovery question is not validated by the membership provider defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.AnswerLookupError>中定义的成员资格提供程序不验证密码恢复问题的答案时，将引发事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the membership provider does not support password recovery question and answer, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.AnswerLookupError> event is never raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果成员资格提供程序不支持密码恢复问题和答案，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.AnswerLookupError>永远不会引发事件。

trans-unit.target: 获取对属性集合的引用，这些属性定义 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery" /> 控件中错误文本的外观。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>对象返回。

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `FailureTextStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>类 (例如， `FailureTextStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `FailureTextStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式设置此属性的形式`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `FailureTextStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常用的设置包括自定义的背景色、 文本颜色和字体属性。

trans-unit.target: 样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.FailureTextStyle%2A>属性合并的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件。

trans-unit.source: Any settings made in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.FailureTextStyle%2A> property override the corresponding settings in properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: 在中所做的任何设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.FailureTextStyle%2A>属性重写的属性中的相应设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件。

trans-unit.target: 当你使用模板定义的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.FailureTextStyle%2A>属性不起作用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error message to display when there is a problem with the membership provider for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery" /> 控件的成员资格提供程序存在问题时显示的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The error message displayed when the user's password will not be sent by email because of a problem with the membership provider.
trans-unit.target: 由于问题成员资格提供程序不通过电子邮件发送用户的密码时显示的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Your attempt to retrieve your password has failed.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为“您恢复密码的尝试失败。

trans-unit.source: Please try again."
trans-unit.target: 请重试。”

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.GeneralFailureText%2A> property is displayed to the user when there is a problem with the membership provider that manages user information for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.GeneralFailureText%2A>管理的用户信息的成员资格提供程序问题时，向用户显示的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.GeneralFailureText%2A> property is displayed when the membership provider cannot connect to the data store containing user information.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.GeneralFailureText%2A>成员资格提供程序无法连接到包含用户信息的数据存储时，将显示属性。

trans-unit.source: The text specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameFailureText%2A> property is displayed in the UserName view when the provider cannot find the specified user name in the database.
trans-unit.target: 中指定的文本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameFailureText%2A>当提供程序无法在数据库中找到指定的用户名称，属性将显示在用户名视图。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionFailureText%2A> property is displayed in the Question view when the answer entered by the user does not match the stored answer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionFailureText%2A>用户输入的答案与存储的答案不匹配时，问题视图中显示的属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.GeneralFailureText%2A> property is displayed for all other errors.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.GeneralFailureText%2A>属性显示的所有其他错误。

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.GeneralFailureText%2A> property is defined by the style settings in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.FailureTextStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.GeneralFailureText%2A>属性定义中的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.FailureTextStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: When you set templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.GeneralFailureText%2A> property is displayed in an optional <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control with the control ID set to "FailureText".
trans-unit.target: 当你将设置模板，以定义的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.GeneralFailureText%2A>属性显示在一个可选<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>与设置为"FailureText"的控件 ID 的控件。

trans-unit.target: 属性的默认文本进行了本地化基于服务器的区域设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the characteristics of email messages used to send new or recovered passwords to users.
trans-unit.target: 获取对属性集合的引用，这些属性定义用于向用户发送新的或恢复的密码的电子邮件的特性。

trans-unit.source: A reference to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition" /> that contains properties that define the characteristics of email messages used to send users their passwords.
trans-unit.target: 对引用<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition" />包含定义的用来发送其密码的用户的电子邮件消息的特征的属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MailDefinition%2A> property returns a reference to a group of properties that you use to define format and content of the password email message sent to users.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MailDefinition%2A>属性返回对一组用于定义格式的属性和内容的密码电子邮件消息发送给用户的引用。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include the subject line and the sender's return address.
trans-unit.target: 常用的设置包括的主题行和发件人的寄信人地址。

trans-unit.source: For a complete list of properties, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> class.
trans-unit.target: 属性的完整列表，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>类。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>对象返回。

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> class (for example, `MailDefinition-Subject`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>类 (例如， `MailDefinition-Subject`)。

trans-unit.source: You can also set the properties programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `MailDefinition.Subject`).
trans-unit.target: 你还可以设置属性以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `MailDefinition.Subject`)。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: When the email message is created from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> object, it will make the substitutions shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 当从创建电子邮件时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>对象，它将使以下表所示的替换。

trans-unit.source: The substitution text is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 替换文本不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: Substitution text
trans-unit.target: 替换文本

trans-unit.source: Replaced with
trans-unit.target: 替换为

trans-unit.source: The Web site user name of the user.
trans-unit.target: 网站用户的用户的名称。

trans-unit.source: The recovered password for the user.
trans-unit.target: 用户的恢复的密码。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.IsBodyHtml%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> object is `true`, the contents of the mail message will be HTML encoded to guard against cross-site scripting security vulnerabilities for the message recipient.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.IsBodyHtml%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>对象是`true`，对电子邮件的内容将 HTML 编码的消息接收方防止跨站点脚本的安全漏洞。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendingMail> event to define the password email message by setting subproperties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MailDefinition%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendingMail>事件，以通过设置子属性的定义密码电子邮件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MailDefinition%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the membership provider used to look up user information.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于查找用户信息的成员资格提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The membership provider used to look up user information.
trans-unit.target: 用于查找用户信息的成员资格提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A> property identifies the membership provider used to verify user information entered in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A>属性标识用于验证输入中的用户信息的成员资格提供程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件。

trans-unit.source: Membership providers are defined in the Web.config file in the <`membership`> section.
trans-unit.target: 在 Web.config 文件中定义成员资格提供程序 <`membership`> 部分。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A> property will change the provider used.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A>属性将更改使用的提供程序。

trans-unit.source: If you do not set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A> property, it will always return <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你未设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A>属性，它始终返回<xref:System.String.Empty>。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.VerifyingUser>事件来更改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A>属性。

trans-unit.target: 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).

trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendMailError" /> event when an email message cannot be sent to the user.
trans-unit.target: 当无法向用户发送电子邮件时引发 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendMailError" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.OnSendMailError%2A> method is called when the SMTP Mail service throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.OnSendMailError%2A> SMTP 邮件服务引发异常时调用方法。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendMailError> error and, if the exception is not handled, rethrows the exception while maintaining the call stack.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendMailError>错误并且，如果未处理异常时，会再次引发异常时维护调用堆栈。

trans-unit.source: Examine the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Exception%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs> object passed as the `e` parameter to determine the actual cause of the exception.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Exception%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs>对象作为传递`e`参数，以确定异常的实际原因。

trans-unit.source: During development, the most common reason that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendMailError> event is raised is that the `<smtpMail>` section of the Web.config file is incorrect.
trans-unit.target: 在开发期间，最常见原因，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendMailError>在于引发事件`<smtpMail>`Web.config 文件的部分不正确。

trans-unit.source: After deployment, this event can occur for a variety of reasons, most having to do with errors in an email address.
trans-unit.target: 在部署之后，可能因多种原因，最无需对电子邮件地址中的错误发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: You must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the object passed as the `e` parameter to `true` to signal that the exception has been handled; otherwise, the exception is thrown again.
trans-unit.target: 必须设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A>作为传递的对象属性`e`参数`true`发出信号，异常已处理; 否则为再次引发异常。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.Question%2A>属性包含 Web 站点以前建立用户的密码恢复确认问题。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.Question%2A> property is displayed only in the Question view.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.Question%2A>仅在问题视图中显示属性。

trans-unit.source: If the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A> property does not support password question and answer, the Question view is not displayed and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.Question%2A> property is not used.
trans-unit.target: 如果成员资格提供程序中指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A>属性不支持密码提示问题和答案，未显示问题视图和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.Question%2A>未使用属性。

trans-unit.source: The membership provider returns the question only after the user enters a valid user name.
trans-unit.target: 只有在用户输入有效的用户名称后，成员资格提供程序返回问题。

trans-unit.source: Until the user enters a valid user name, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.Question%2A> property is <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: 直到用户输入有效的用户名，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.Question%2A>属性是<xref:System.String.Empty>。

trans-unit.source: The style settings in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TextBoxStyle%2A> property define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.Question%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 中的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TextBoxStyle%2A>属性定义的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.Question%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A> property to define the appearance of the Question view, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.Question%2A> property is displayed in an optional <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property set to "Question".
trans-unit.target: 当你使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A>属性来定义问题视图中的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.Question%2A>属性显示在一个可选<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>控件替换为<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>属性设置为"问题"。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display when the user's answer to the password recovery confirmation question does not match the answer stored in the Web site data store.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在用户的密码恢复确认提示问题答案与网站数据存储中存储的答案不匹配时显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The text to display when the user's answer to the password recovery confirmation question does not match the answer stored in the Web site data store.
trans-unit.target: 当用户的密码恢复确认提示问题答案与网站数据存储中存储的答案不匹配时显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The default value is "Your answer could not be verified.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为“未能验证您的答案。

trans-unit.source: Please try again."
trans-unit.target: 请重试。”

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionFailureText%2A> property contains the error message that is displayed when the answer to the password recovery confirmation question does not match the answer stored in the Web site data store.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionFailureText%2A>属性包含密码恢复确认问题的答案与存储在网站的数据存储区的答案不匹配时显示的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The style settings in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.FailureTextStyle%2A> property define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionFailureText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 中的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.FailureTextStyle%2A>属性定义的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionFailureText%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: When you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionFailureText%2A> property is displayed in an optional <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property set to "FailureText".
trans-unit.target: 当你使用模板定义的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionFailureText%2A>属性显示在一个可选<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>控件替换为<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>属性设置为"FailureText"。

trans-unit.source: The default text for the property is localized based on the server's locale setting.
trans-unit.target: 属性的默认文本进行了本地化基于服务器的区域设置。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display in the Question view to instruct the user to answer the password recovery confirmation question.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置“提示问题”视图中显示的文本，以指示用户回答密码恢复确认提示问题。

trans-unit.source: The instruction text to display in the Question view.
trans-unit.target: 在“提示问题”视图中显示的说明文本。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Answer the following question to receive your password."
trans-unit.target: 默认值为“要接收您的密码，请回答下列问题。”

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionInstructionText%2A> property is displayed in Question view to instruct the user to answer the password recovery confirmation question.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to display the Question view of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于显示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery" /> 控件的“提示问题”视图的模板。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> that contains the template for displaying the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery" /> control in Question view.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" />，包含用于在“提示问题”视图中显示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery" /> 控件的模板。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A> property contains the template that defines the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control in Question view.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A>属性包含定义的外观的模板<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制问题的视图。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the required and optional controls used in the Question view template.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出问题视图模板中使用的必需和可选控件。

trans-unit.source: ID or Command name
trans-unit.target: ID 或命令名称

trans-unit.source: Control type
trans-unit.target: 控件类型

trans-unit.source: Required/optional
trans-unit.target: 必需/可选

trans-unit.source: Any control that implements <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>.
trans-unit.target: 实现任何控件<xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>。

trans-unit.source: Required
trans-unit.target: 必需

trans-unit.source: Any control that causes event bubbling.
trans-unit.target: 导致事件冒泡任何控件。

trans-unit.source: Optional
trans-unit.target: Optional

trans-unit.source: The Submit control can be any control that causes event bubbling, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>.
trans-unit.target: 提交控件可以是任何导致控件事件上传方法，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>。

trans-unit.source: The control's command name property must be set to "Submit".
trans-unit.target: 控件的命令名称属性必须设置为"提交"。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control throws an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception if the Question view does not contain the required controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件将引发<xref:System.Web.HttpException>异常如果问题视图不包含所需的控件。

trans-unit.source: No exception is thrown if you give an optional control ID to a control of the wrong type; however, the control is subsequently ignored by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: 在可选控件 ID 赋予错误类型; 的控件不引发任何异常但是，该控件随后将被忽略<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件。

trans-unit.source: When you use a template to define the appearance of the Question view, only the following properties affect the behavior of the control:

trans-unit.target: 所有属性都继承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>(有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件成员表)。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.Answer%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.GeneralFailureText%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.GeneralFailureText%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MailDefinition%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MailDefinition%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.Question%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.Question%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionFailureText%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionFailureText%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTemplate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTemplate%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserName%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameFailureText%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameFailureText%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A>。

trans-unit.source: All other properties are inactive when you use a template for the Question view.
trans-unit.target: 问题视图使用模板时，所有其他属性都是处于非活动状态。

trans-unit.source: If the user does not enter a valid user name, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTitleText%2A> property is reset in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.AnswerLookupError> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户未输入有效的用户名，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTitleText%2A>中重置属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.AnswerLookupError>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that receives the rendered output.
trans-unit.target: 接收呈现输出的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Writes the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl" /> content to the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object, for display on the client.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl" /> 内容写入指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 对象，以便在客户端上显示。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control encloses rendered HTML in a <see langword="table" /> element in order to apply inline styles.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示控件是否将呈现的 HTML 包含在 <see langword="table" /> 元素中，以便应用内联样式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control encloses rendered HTML in a <see langword="table" /> element; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件将呈现的 HTML 包含在 <see langword="true" /> 元素中，则为 <see langword="table" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: In order to make inline style properties such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A> apply to all the HTML that is rendered for the control, ASP.NET encloses the rendered HTML in a `table` element.
trans-unit.target: 为了使内联样式属性，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A>适用于所有控件呈现的 HTML，ASP.NET 将中呈现的 HTML`table`元素。

trans-unit.source: If you do not want the outer `table` element to be rendered, set this property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果不希望外部`table`元素呈现，将此属性设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: In that case, if you try to set inline style properties that apply to the whole control, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，如果你尝试设置应用于整个控件的样式属性的内联，则引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Saves any server control state changes that have occurred since the time the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 保存将页面回发到服务器之后发生的所有服务器控件状态更改。

trans-unit.source: Returns the server control's current state.
trans-unit.target: 返回服务器控件的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: If there is no state associated with the control, this method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有与该控件关联的状态，则此方法返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Saves any state that was modified after the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.TrackViewState" /> method was invoked.
trans-unit.target: 保存调用 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.TrackViewState" /> 方法后修改的任何状态。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the current view state of the control; otherwise, if there is no view state associated with the control, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含该控件的当前视图状态的对象；如果没有与该控件关联的视图状态，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the user is sent a password in email.
trans-unit.target: 在通过电子邮件向用户发送密码之前发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendingMail> event occurs on the server after the user requests a new or recovered password and submits a correct answer to the password confirmation question (if your membership provider supports password question and answer), but before the password is sent to the user in email.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendingMail>用户请求新的或恢复密码，并且提交到密码确认问题 （如果成员资格提供程序支持密码提示问题和答案），正确答案后但在发送密码之前，在服务器上发生事件电子邮件中的用户。

trans-unit.source: Use this event to do any special processing required before sending the email message, such as setting <xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage> properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用此事件来执行前发送电子邮件，例如设置所需的任何特殊处理<xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage>属性。

trans-unit.source: After the user enters a valid user name and, if relevant, a valid answer, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendingMail> event, and then sends the password information to the user in email.
trans-unit.target: 用户输入有效的用户名称后，如果相关，一个有效的答案，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件都将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendingMail>事件，然后将密码信息发送给电子邮件中的用户。

trans-unit.source: The email uses the settings defined in the `<smtpMail>` configuration file element.
trans-unit.target: 电子邮件使用中定义的设置`<smtpMail>`配置文件元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendingMail> event to set properties of the <xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage> object that contains the email message.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendingMail>事件设置的属性<xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage>包含电子邮件的对象。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the SMTP Mail system throws an error while attempting to send an email message.
trans-unit.target: 尝试发送电子邮件时，在 SMTP Mail 系统引发错误时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendMailError> event is raised when the SMTP mail server throws an exception when trying to send an email message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendMailError> SMTP 邮件服务器尝试发送电子邮件时引发异常时引发事件。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendMailError> event does not handle the SMTP error from the mail system.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendMailError>事件并不处理的邮件系统中的 SMTP 错误。

trans-unit.source: The method that handles the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendMailError> event must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs> object to `true` to handle the error and prevent it from being displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 处理的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendMailError>事件必须设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs>对象传递给`true`处理错误并防止它显示给用户。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The design-time data for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的设计时数据。

trans-unit.target: 实现基 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.System#Web#UI#IControlDesignerAccessor#SetDesignModeState(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Represents the command to perform when the Submit button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 表示单击“提交”按钮时执行的命令。

trans-unit.source: This field is a string that represents the command to perform when the Submit button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为一个字符串，表示要在单击提交按钮时执行的命令。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Submit".
trans-unit.target: 默认值为“提交”。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为只读。

trans-unit.source: If you use a template with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control, you must use this command name for the action performed to submit the form or the control will not function properly.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用具有的模板<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件，必须使用此命令名称表示执行以提交该表单的操作或控件将无法正常工作。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of an image to use as the Submit button.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用作“提交”按钮的图像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the image to use as the Submit button.
trans-unit.target: 用作“提交”按钮的图像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonImageUrl%2A> property contains the URL of the image to use for the Submit button when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonType%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Image>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonImageUrl%2A>属性包含的图像的 URL 用于提交按钮时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonType%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Image>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonText%2A> property is used as the alternative text for the image in browsers that do not display images.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonText%2A>属性用作中不显示图像的浏览器的图像的替换文字。

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonImageUrl%2A> property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A>属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonImageUrl%2A>属性不起作用。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the appearance of Submit buttons in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取对属性集合的引用，这些属性定义 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery" /> 控件中“提交”按钮的外观。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that contains properties that define the appearance of the Submit buttons.
trans-unit.target: 对 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 的引用，它包含定义“提交”按钮外观的属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonStyle%2A> property defines the appearance of Submit buttons in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonStyle%2A>属性定义中的提交按钮的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>对象返回。

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `SubmitButtonStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>类 (例如， `SubmitButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: You can also set the properties programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `SubmitButtonStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你还可以设置属性以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `SubmitButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常用的设置包括自定义的背景色、 文本颜色和字体属性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonStyle%2A> property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: 样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonStyle%2A>属性合并的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件。

trans-unit.source: Any settings made in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonStyle%2A> property override the corresponding settings in properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: 在中所做的任何设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonStyle%2A>属性重写的属性中的相应设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> properties are overridden by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonStyle%2A> settings:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>属性重写了<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonStyle%2A>设置：

trans-unit.source: When you use templates to define the appearance of the initial or Question view of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonStyle%2A> property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用模板来定义的初始的外观或问题视图<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonStyle%2A>属性不起作用。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置提交窗体的按钮的文本。

trans-unit.source: The text of the button.
trans-unit.target: 按钮的文本。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Submit".
trans-unit.target: 默认值为“提交”。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonText%2A> property contains the text displayed for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control's Submit button.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonText%2A>属性包含为显示的文本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件的提交按钮。

trans-unit.source: How the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonText%2A> property is used depends on the setting of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonText%2A>使用属性依赖于设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonType%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For details, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonType%2A>。

trans-unit.source: When you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonText%2A> property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用模板定义的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonText%2A>属性不起作用。

trans-unit.source: The default text for the property is localized based on the server's locale setting.
trans-unit.target: 属性的默认文本进行了本地化基于服务器的区域设置。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the page to display after sending a password successfully.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置成功发送密码后显示的页面的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the password success page.
trans-unit.target: 密码成功页的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A> property contains the URL of the page that is displayed after a password has successfully been sent to a user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A>属性包含的密码已成功发送给用户后，将显示的页面的 URL。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A> property is not `null`, the user is directed to the page defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A> property; otherwise, the page containing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control is refreshed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A>属性不是`null`，用户将被导向中定义的页<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A>属性; 否则为页包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>刷新控件。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control to redirect the user to the page defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A> property after sending the user a new password.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件将用户重定向到中定义的页<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A>之后发送一个新密码的用户的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the container that a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery" /> control used to create an instance of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTemplate" /> template.
trans-unit.target: 获取供 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery" /> 控件用来创建 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTemplate" /> 模板实例的容器。

trans-unit.source: This property provides programmatic access to child controls.
trans-unit.target: 此属性提供对子控件的编程访问。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to programmatically access child controls when using a template.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以用于使用模板时以编程方式访问子控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display after sending a password successfully.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置成功发送密码后显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The text to display when a password has been successfully sent.
trans-unit.target: 成功发送密码后显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Your password has been sent to you."
trans-unit.target: 默认值为“您的密码已发送给您。”

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessText%2A> property is displayed in the Success view when a password has been successfully sent to a user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessText%2A>时密码已成功发送到用户，属性显示在成功视图。

trans-unit.source: The style settings in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTextStyle%2A> property define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 中的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTextStyle%2A>属性定义的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessText%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: When you use a template assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTemplate%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessText%2A> property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用模板分配给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTemplate%2A>属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessText%2A>属性不起作用。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A> property is not `null`, the user is redirected to the page defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A> property, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control's Success view is not shown to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A>属性不是`null`，用户定向到在中定义的页<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A>属性，与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件的成功视图不向用户显示。

trans-unit.source: The default text for the property is localized based on the server's locale setting.
trans-unit.target: 属性的默认文本进行了本地化基于服务器的区域设置。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.

trans-unit.source: A reference to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that contains properties that define the appearance of text displayed in the Success view.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTextStyle%2A> property defines the appearance of text in the Success view of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTextStyle%2A>属性的成功视图中定义的文本外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>对象返回。

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `SuccessTextStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>类 (例如， `SuccessTextStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: You can also set the properties programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `SuccessTextStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你还可以设置属性以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `SuccessTextStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常用的设置包括自定义的背景色、 文本颜色和字体属性。

trans-unit.target: 在中所做的任何设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTextStyle%2A>属性重写的属性中的相应设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件。
